tasks.title: Initialize Project Repository
tasks.description: Set up Git repository and initial project structure

tasks.title: Set Up Hugo with Doks Theme
tasks.description: Install and configure Hugo with Doks theme

tasks.title: Deploy to Netlify
tasks.description: Configure and deploy the site to Netlify

tasks.title: Set Up Custom Domain
tasks.description: Configure faq.1516.co.in with proper DNS settings

tasks.title: Content Structure Setup
tasks.description: Create content structure for documents and jobs

subtasks.title: Define Document Content Structure
subtasks.description: Define the taxonomy and front matter structure for document content type
subtasks.details: Create a detailed schema for document content type including required fields (title, description, content), taxonomy categories, and metadata structure. Define how documents will be organized in the content repository.
subtasks.testStrategy: Validate the schema against PRD requirements and ensure it supports the required URL structure

subtasks.title: Define Job Content Structure
subtasks.description: Define the taxonomy and front matter structure for job content type
subtasks.details: Create a detailed schema for job content type including required fields (title, description, requirements, location), taxonomy categories, and metadata structure. Define how jobs will be organized in the content repository.
subtasks.testStrategy: Validate the schema against PRD requirements and ensure it supports the required URL structure

subtasks.title: Implement Content Folder Structure
subtasks.description: Set up the folder structure in the content repository for both content types
subtasks.details: Create the necessary folder hierarchy in the content repository that aligns with the defined taxonomies. Ensure the structure supports content organization by categories, types, and other classification needs.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify that the folder structure enables proper content organization and supports the required navigation paths

subtasks.title: Create Content Templates
subtasks.description: Develop templates for document and job content types with predefined front matter
subtasks.details: Create template files for both content types that include all required front matter fields with appropriate default values or placeholders. These templates will serve as the starting point for content creation.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test templates by creating sample content entries and validating that all required fields are present

subtasks.title: Document Content Structure Guidelines
subtasks.description: Create documentation for content structure and usage guidelines
subtasks.details: Develop comprehensive documentation that explains the content structure, taxonomy organization, required fields, and best practices for content creation. Include examples and edge cases to guide content creators.
subtasks.testStrategy: Review documentation with stakeholders to ensure clarity and completeness

tasks.title: Implement Search Functionality
tasks.description: Set up Fuse.js for client-side search

tasks.title: Decap CMS Integration
tasks.description: Configure Decap CMS for content management

tasks.title: Testing and Quality Assurance
tasks.description: Test all features and fix any issues

tasks.title: Documentation
tasks.description: Write documentation for contributors and users

tasks.title: Launch Preparation
tasks.description: Final checks and preparations for launch
